root.name: Vehicle Cavalier
root.description: OverviewVehicle Cavalier is a scifi mecha combat game for the PS1. It features eight characters each with their own story, and extensive mech customization including 300 attachable weapons,Originally released in Japan in 1995, its first North American release was in 2012 as an untranslated PSOne import published by GungHo Online Entertainment America.
